//ECHO $application_str =  str_replace( 17 ,'',$application_str) ;	
//GetSSOIDFromAadhaarJSON RJCT201211017029;SHUCHITA.PRIYAMVADA; 9887388306
//$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/583112224605'; Harsh2001 PRAHLAD.NARAYAN.KAKK;
/* 	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RAHUL14336SEN/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetSSOIDFromAadhaarXML/564141571757';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
		exit; */
$POST = $_POST;
$fields = '';

function callSSO( $url, $data = false, $method ='')
	{
		$curl = curl_init();
		$url =  $url;
		switch ($method)
		{
			case "POST":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POST, 1);

				if ($data)
					curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
				break;
			case "PUT":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_PUT, 1);
				break;
			default:
				if ($data)
					$url = sprintf("%s?%s", $url, http_build_query($data));
		}
		//echo $url;
		// Optional Authentication:
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_BASIC);
	   // curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "madarsa.test:Test@1234");

		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);

		$result = curl_exec($curl);

		curl_close($curl);

		return $result;
	}
	
//$POST['encData'] = '';

if(empty($POST)){
exit;
} 
	
if(isset( $POST['userdetails'])){
	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/' . $POST['userdetails'];
	
	$output = callSSO($url);
	$result = json_decode($output,true);
	 
	if(isset($result['sAMAccountName']) && !empty($result['sAMAccountName'])){
		$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/' . $result['sAMAccountName']  . '/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RJCP201211017029/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
	}
}
 
$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="project_id" id="project_id" value="">'; 
foreach($POST as $k=>$v){
	$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="'. $k . '" value="' . $v . '">'; 
}
	
	
$servername = "10.68.181.231";
$username = "dcenoc19";
$password = "dcenoc19@123#";
$dataBase = "dcenoc19";


try {
$conn = new PDO("mysql:host=$servername;dbname=$dataBase", $username, $password);
// set the PDO error mode to exception
$conn->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE, PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);

}
catch(PDOException $e)
{
echo "Connection failed: " . $e->getMessage();exit;
}

$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM noc_sso_landings_local"); 
$stmt->execute();

// set the resulting array to associative
$result = $stmt->setFetchMode(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC); 
$data = $stmt->fetchAll();	
	
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>

 <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <title>SSO LANDING PAGE</title>
  <!-- Tell the browser to be responsive to screen width -->
  <meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no" name="viewport">
  <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />   <!-- Font Awesome -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.5.0/css/font-awesome.min.css">
  <!-- Ionicons -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/ionicons/2.0.1/css/ionicons.min.css">

 <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/AdminLTE.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/skins/skin-blue-light.min.css"/>  
<script src="jquery-2.2.4.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="hold-transition login-page">
<div class="login-box">
  <div class="login-logo">
    <b>LOGIN</b>
  </div>
  <!-- /.login-logo -->
  <div class="login-box-body">
    <p class="login-box-msg">Select Your Organization and Application to start your session</p>

    <form action="" method="post" id="ssoFrm">
	  <?php echo $fields;
	   echo $data[0]['description']; ?>
	  
   </form>

    
    <!-- /.social-auth-links -->

   

  </div>
  <!-- /.login-box-body -->
</div>
<!-- /.login-box -->

<script>
$(function(){
$("#ssoFrm").submit(function(){
	var act = $("#application_name").val();
	var option = $('#application_name option:selected').attr('data-project_id');
	if(option){
			$("#project_id").val(option);
	}
	var app_name = '';
	if(act!=''){
		if(act == 'College Management' || act == 'generic' || act == 'women_nonengg'  || act == 'Examination Forms'  ){
			app_name = act;
			act = 'http://hte.rajasthan.gov.in/organization/rajcomp/sso-landing-options';
			
		}
		$("#app_name").val(app_name);
		$("#ssoFrm").attr('action',act);
		return true;
	}
	return false;
});
	$("#organization_name").on('change',function(){
		
		$("#application_name").find("option").addClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option[data-id='0']").removeClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option."  + $(this).val() + "").removeClass('hide');
		
	});
});
</script>

</body>

</html>

	<?php 

define('SSO_URL','http://sso.rajasthan.gov.in');
define('SSO_API_URL',SSO_URL .':8888/SSOREST/');

//ECHO $application_str =  str_replace( 17 ,'',$application_str) ;	
//GetSSOIDFromAadhaarJSON RJCT201211017029;SHUCHITA.PRIYAMVADA; 9887388306
//$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/583112224605'; Harsh2001 PRAHLAD.NARAYAN.KAKK;
/* 	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RAHUL14336SEN/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetSSOIDFromAadhaarXML/564141571757';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
		exit; */
$POST = $_POST;
$fields = '';

function callSSO( $url, $data = false, $method ='')
	{
		$curl = curl_init();
		$url =  $url;
		switch ($method)
		{
			case "POST":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POST, 1);

				if ($data)
					curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
				break;
			case "PUT":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_PUT, 1);
				break;
			default:
				if ($data)
					$url = sprintf("%s?%s", $url, http_build_query($data));
		}
		//echo $url;
		// Optional Authentication:
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_BASIC);
	   // curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "madarsa.test:Test@1234");

		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);

		$result = curl_exec($curl);

		curl_close($curl);

		return $result;
	}
	
//$POST['encData'] = '';

if(empty($POST)){
exit;
} 
	
if(isset( $POST['userdetails'])){
	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/' . $POST['userdetails'];
	
	$output = callSSO($url);
	$result = json_decode($output,true);
	 
	if(isset($result['sAMAccountName']) && !empty($result['sAMAccountName'])){
		$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/' . $result['sAMAccountName']  . '/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RJCP201211017029/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
	}
}
 
$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="project_id" id="project_id" value="">'; 
foreach($POST as $k=>$v){
	$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="'. $k . '" value="' . $v . '">'; 
}
	
	
$servername = "10.68.181.231";
$username = "dcenoc19";
$password = "dcenoc19@123#";
$dataBase = "dcenoc19";


try {
$conn = new PDO("mysql:host=$servername;dbname=$dataBase", $username, $password);
// set the PDO error mode to exception
$conn->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE, PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);

}
catch(PDOException $e)
{
echo "Connection failed: " . $e->getMessage();exit;
}

$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM noc_sso_landings_local"); 
$stmt->execute();

// set the resulting array to associative
$result = $stmt->setFetchMode(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC); 
$data = $stmt->fetchAll();	
	
?>

					$url = sprintf("%s?%s", $url, http_build_query($data));
		}
		//echo $url;

		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_BASIC);
	   // curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "madarsa.test:Test@1234");

    <b>LOGIN</b>
  </div>
  <!-- /.login-logo -->
  <div class="login-box-body">
    <p class="login-box-msg">Select Your Organization and Application to start your session</p>

    <form action="" method="post" id="ssoFrm">
	  <?php echo $fields;
	   echo $data[0]['description']; ?>
	  
   </form>

    
    <!-- /.social-auth-links -->

   

  </div>
  <!-- /.login-box-body -->
</div>
<!-- /.login-box -->

<script>
$(function(){
$("#ssoFrm").submit(function(){
	var act = $("#application_name").val();
	var option = $('#application_name option:selected').attr('data-project_id');
	if(option){
			$("#project_id").val(option);
	}
	var app_name = '';
	if(act!=''){
		if(act == 'College Management' || act == 'generic' || act == 'women_nonengg'  || act == 'Examination Forms'  ){
			app_name = act;
			act = 'http://hte.rajasthan.gov.in/organization/rajcomp/sso-landing-options';
			
		}
		$("#app_name").val(app_name);
		$("#ssoFrm").attr('action',act);
		return true;
	}
	return false;
});
	$("#organization_name").on('change',function(){
		
		$("#application_name").find("option").addClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option[data-id='0']").removeClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option."  + $(this).val() + "").removeClass('hide');
		
	});
});
</script>

</body>

</html>

	<?php 

define('SSO_URL','http://sso.rajasthan.gov.in');
define('SSO_API_URL',SSO_URL .':8888/SSOREST/');

//ECHO $application_str =  str_replace( 17 ,'',$application_str) ;	
//GetSSOIDFromAadhaarJSON RJCT201211017029;SHUCHITA.PRIYAMVADA; 9887388306
//$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/583112224605'; Harsh2001 PRAHLAD.NARAYAN.KAKK;
/* 	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RAHUL14336SEN/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetSSOIDFromAadhaarXML/564141571757';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
		exit; */
$POST = $_POST;
$fields = '';

function callSSO( $url, $data = false, $method ='')
	{
		$curl = curl_init();
		$url =  $url;
		switch ($method)
		{
			case "POST":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POST, 1);

				if ($data)
					curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
				break;
			case "PUT":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_PUT, 1);
				break;
			default:
				if ($data)
					$url = sprintf("%s?%s", $url, http_build_query($data));
		}
		//echo $url;
		// Optional Authentication:
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_BASIC);
	   // curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "madarsa.test:Test@1234");

		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);

		$result = curl_exec($curl);

		curl_close($curl);

		return $result;
	}
	
//$POST['encData'] = '';

if(empty($POST)){
exit;
} 
	
if(isset( $POST['userdetails'])){
	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/' . $POST['userdetails'];
	
	$output = callSSO($url);
	$result = json_decode($output,true);
	 
	if(isset($result['sAMAccountName']) && !empty($result['sAMAccountName'])){
		$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/' . $result['sAMAccountName']  . '/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RJCP201211017029/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
	}
}
 
$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="project_id" id="project_id" value="">'; 
foreach($POST as $k=>$v){
	$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="'. $k . '" value="' . $v . '">'; 
}
	
	
$servername = "10.68.181.231";
$username = "dcenoc19";
$password = "dcenoc19@123#";
$dataBase = "dcenoc19";


try {
$conn = new PDO("mysql:host=$servername;dbname=$dataBase", $username, $password);
// set the PDO error mode to exception
$conn->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE, PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);

}
catch(PDOException $e)
{
echo "Connection failed: " . $e->getMessage();exit;
}

$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM noc_sso_landings_local"); 
$stmt->execute();

// set the resulting array to associative
$result = $stmt->setFetchMode(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC); 
$data = $stmt->fetchAll();	
	
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>

 <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <title>SSO LANDING PAGE</title>
  <!-- Tell the browser to be responsive to screen width -->
  <meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no" name="viewport">
  <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />   <!-- Font Awesome -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.5.0/css/font-awesome.min.css">
  <!-- Ionicons -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/ionicons/2.0.1/css/ionicons.min.css">

 <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/AdminLTE.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/skins/skin-blue-light.min.css"/>  
<script src="jquery-2.2.4.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="hold-transition login-page">
<div class="login-box">
  <div class="login-logo">
    <b>LOGIN</b>
  </div>
  <!-- /.login-logo -->
  <div class="login-box-body">
    <p class="login-box-msg">Select Your Organization and Application to start your session</p>

    <form action="" method="post" id="ssoFrm">
	  <?php echo $fields;
	   echo $data[0]['description']; ?>
	  
   </form>

    
    <!-- /.social-auth-links -->

   

  </div>
  <!-- /.login-box-body -->
</div>
<!-- /.login-box -->

<script>
$(function(){
$("#ssoFrm").submit(function(){
	var act = $("#application_name").val();
	var option = $('#application_name option:selected').attr('data-project_id');
	if(option){
			$("#project_id").val(option);
	}
	var app_name = '';
	if(act!=''){
		if(act == 'College Management' || act == 'generic' || act == 'women_nonengg'  || act == 'Examination Forms'  ){
			app_name = act;
			act = 'http://hte.rajasthan.gov.in/organization/rajcomp/sso-landing-options';
			
		}
		$("#app_name").val(app_name);
		$("#ssoFrm").attr('action',act);
		return true;
	}
	return false;
});
	$("#organization_name").on('change',function(){
		
		$("#application_name").find("option").addClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option[data-id='0']").removeClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option."  + $(this).val() + "").removeClass('hide');
		
	});
});
</script>

</body>

function callSSO( $url, $data = false, $method ='')
	{
		$curl = curl_init();
		$url =  $url;
		switch ($method)
		{
			case "POST":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POST, 1);

				if ($data)
					curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
				break;
			case "PUT":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_PUT, 1);
				break;
			default:
				if ($data)
					$url = sprintf("%s?%s", $url, http_build_query($data));
		}
		//echo $url;
		// Optional Authentication:
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_BASIC);
	   // curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "madarsa.test:Test@1234");

		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);

		$result = curl_exec($curl);

		curl_close($curl);

		return $result;
	}
	
//$POST['encData'] = '';

exit;
} 
	
if(isset( $POST['userdetails'])){
	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/' . $POST['userdetails'];
	
	$output = callSSO($url);
	$result = json_decode($output,true);
	 
	if(isset($result['sAMAccountName']) && !empty($result['sAMAccountName'])){
		$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/' . $result['sAMAccountName']  . '/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RJCP201211017029/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
	}
}
 
$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="project_id" id="project_id" value="">'; 
foreach($POST as $k=>$v){
	$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="'. $k . '" value="' . $v . '">';

}
catch(PDOException $e)
{

}

// set the PDO error mode to exception
$conn->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE, PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);

}
catch(PDOException $e)
{
echo "Connection failed: " . $e->getMessage();exit;
}

$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM noc_sso_landings_local"); 
$stmt->execute();

// set the resulting array to associative
$result = $stmt->setFetchMode(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC); 
$data = $stmt->fetchAll();	
	
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>

 <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <title>SSO LANDING PAGE</title>
  <!-- Tell the browser to be responsive to screen width -->
  <meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no" name="viewport">
  <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />   <!-- Font Awesome -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.5.0/css/font-awesome.min.css">
  <!-- Ionicons -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/ionicons/2.0.1/css/ionicons.min.css">

 <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/AdminLTE.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/skins/skin-blue-light.min.css"/>  
<script src="jquery-2.2.4.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="hold-transition login-page">
<div class="login-box">
  <div class="login-logo">
    <b>LOGIN</b>
  </div>
  <!-- /.login-logo -->
  <div class="login-box-body">
    <p class="login-box-msg">Select Your Organization and Application to start your session</p>

    <form action="" method="post" id="ssoFrm">
	  <?php echo $fields;
	   echo $data[0]['description']; ?>
	  
   </form>

    
    <!-- /.social-auth-links -->

   

  </div>
  <!-- /.login-box-body -->
</div>
<!-- /.login-box -->

<script>
$(function(){
$("#ssoFrm").submit(function(){
	var act = $("#application_name").val();
	var option = $('#application_name option:selected').attr('data-project_id');
	if(option){
			$("#project_id").val(option);
	}
	var app_name = '';
	if(act!=''){
		if(act == 'College Management' || act == 'generic' || act == 'women_nonengg'  || act == 'Examination Forms'  ){
			app_name = act;
			act = 'http://hte.rajasthan.gov.in/organization/rajcomp/sso-landing-options';
			
		}
		$("#app_name").val(app_name);
		$("#ssoFrm").attr('action',act);
		return true;
	}
	return false;
});
	$("#organization_name").on('change',function(){
		
		$("#application_name").find("option").addClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option[data-id='0']").removeClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option."  + $(this).val() + "").removeClass('hide');
		
	});
});
</script>

</body>

</html>

	<?php 

define('SSO_URL','http://sso.rajasthan.gov.in');
define('SSO_API_URL',SSO_URL .':8888/SSOREST/');

//ECHO $application_str =  str_replace( 17 ,'',$application_str) ;	
//GetSSOIDFromAadhaarJSON RJCT201211017029;SHUCHITA.PRIYAMVADA; 9887388306
//$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/583112224605'; Harsh2001 PRAHLAD.NARAYAN.KAKK;
/* 	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RAHUL14336SEN/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetSSOIDFromAadhaarXML/564141571757';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
		exit; */
$POST = $_POST;
$fields = '';

function callSSO( $url, $data = false, $method ='')
	{
		$curl = curl_init();
		$url =  $url;
		switch ($method)
		{
			case "POST":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POST, 1);

				if ($data)
					curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
				break;
			case "PUT":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_PUT, 1);
				break;
			default:
				if ($data)
					$url = sprintf("%s?%s", $url, http_build_query($data));
		}
		//echo $url;
		// Optional Authentication:
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_BASIC);
	   // curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "madarsa.test:Test@1234");

		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);

		$result = curl_exec($curl);

		curl_close($curl);

		return $result;
	}
	
//$POST['encData'] = '';

if(empty($POST)){
exit;
} 
	
if(isset( $POST['userdetails'])){
	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/' . $POST['userdetails'];
	
	$output = callSSO($url);
	$result = json_decode($output,true);
	 
	if(isset($result['sAMAccountName']) && !empty($result['sAMAccountName'])){
		$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/' . $result['sAMAccountName']  . '/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RJCP201211017029/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
	}
}
 
$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="project_id" id="project_id" value="">'; 
foreach($POST as $k=>$v){
	$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="'. $k . '" value="' . $v . '">'; 
}
	
	
$servername = "10.68.181.231";
$username = "dcenoc19";
$password = "dcenoc19@123#";
$dataBase = "dcenoc19";


try {
$conn = new PDO("mysql:host=$servername;dbname=$dataBase", $username, $password);
// set the PDO error mode to exception
$conn->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE, PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);

}
catch(PDOException $e)
{
echo "Connection failed: " . $e->getMessage();exit;
}

$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM noc_sso_landings_local"); 
$stmt->execute();

// set the resulting array to associative
$result = $stmt->setFetchMode(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC); 
$data = $stmt->fetchAll();	
	
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>

 <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <title>SSO LANDING PAGE</title>
  <!-- Tell the browser to be responsive to screen width -->
  <meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no" name="viewport">
  <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />   <!-- Font Awesome -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.5.0/css/font-awesome.min.css">
  <!-- Ionicons -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/ionicons/2.0.1/css/ionicons.min.css">

 <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/AdminLTE.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/skins/skin-blue-light.min.css"/>  
<script src="jquery-2.2.4.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="hold-transition login-page">
<div class="login-box">
  <div class="login-logo">
    <b>LOGIN</b>
  </div>
  <!-- /.login-logo -->
  <div class="login-box-body">
    <p class="login-box-msg">Select Your Organization and Application to start your session</p>

    <form action="" method="post" id="ssoFrm">
	  <?php echo $fields;
	   echo $data[0]['description']; ?>
	  
   </form>

    
    <!-- /.social-auth-links -->

   

  </div>
  <!-- /.login-box-body -->
</div>
<!-- /.login-box -->

<script>
$(function(){
$("#ssoFrm").submit(function(){
	var act = $("#application_name").val();
	var option = $('#application_name option:selected').attr('data-project_id');
	if(option){
			$("#project_id").val(option);
	}
	var app_name = '';
	if(act!=''){
		if(act == 'College Management' || act == 'generic' || act == 'women_nonengg'  || act == 'Examination Forms'  ){
			app_name = act;
			act = 'http://hte.rajasthan.gov.in/organization/rajcomp/sso-landing-options';
			
		}
		$("#app_name").val(app_name);
		$("#ssoFrm").attr('action',act);
		return true;
	}
	return false;
});
	$("#organization_name").on('change',function(){
		
		$("#application_name").find("option").addClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option[data-id='0']").removeClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option."  + $(this).val() + "").removeClass('hide');
		
	});
});
</script>

</body>

</html>

		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);

		//echo $url;
		// Optional Authentication:
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_BASIC);
	   // curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "madarsa.test:Test@1234");

		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);

		$result = curl_exec($curl);

		curl_close($curl);

		return $result;
	}
	
//$POST['encData'] = '';

if(empty($POST)){
exit;
} 
	
if(isset( $POST['userdetails'])){
	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/' . $POST['userdetails'];
	
	$output = callSSO($url);
	$result = json_decode($output,true);
	 
	if(isset($result['sAMAccountName']) && !empty($result['sAMAccountName'])){
		$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/' . $result['sAMAccountName']  . '/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RJCP201211017029/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
	}
}
 
$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="project_id" id="project_id" value="">'; 
foreach($POST as $k=>$v){
	$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="'. $k . '" value="' . $v . '">'; 
}
	
	
$servername = "10.68.181.231";
$username = "dcenoc19";
$password = "dcenoc19@123#";
$dataBase = "dcenoc19";


try {
$conn = new PDO("mysql:host=$servername;dbname=$dataBase", $username, $password);
// set the PDO error mode to exception
$conn->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE, PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);

}
catch(PDOException $e)
{
echo "Connection failed: " . $e->getMessage();exit;
}

$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM noc_sso_landings_local"); 
$stmt->execute();

// set the resulting array to associative
$result = $stmt->setFetchMode(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC); 
$data = $stmt->fetchAll();	
	
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>

 <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <title>SSO LANDING PAGE</title>
  <!-- Tell the browser to be responsive to screen width -->
  <meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no" name="viewport">
  <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />   <!-- Font Awesome -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.5.0/css/font-awesome.min.css">
  <!-- Ionicons -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/ionicons/2.0.1/css/ionicons.min.css">

 <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/AdminLTE.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/skins/skin-blue-light.min.css"/>

</head>
<body class="hold-transition login-page">
<div class="login-box">
  <div class="login-logo">
    <b>LOGIN</b>
  </div>
  <!-- /.login-logo -->
  <div class="login-box-body">
    <p class="login-box-msg">Select Your Organization and Application to start your session</p>

    <form action="" method="post" id="ssoFrm">
	  <?php echo $fields;
	   echo $data[0]['description']; ?>
	  
   </form>

    
    <!-- /.social-auth-links -->

   

  </div>
  <!-- /.login-box-body -->
</div>
<!-- /.login-box -->

<script>
$(function(){
$("#ssoFrm").submit(function(){
	var act = $("#application_name").val();
	var option = $('#application_name option:selected').attr('data-project_id');
	if(option){
			$("#project_id").val(option);
	}
	var app_name = '';
	if(act!=''){
		if(act == 'College Management' || act == 'generic' || act == 'women_nonengg'  || act == 'Examination Forms'  ){
			app_name = act;
			act = 'http://hte.rajasthan.gov.in/organization/rajcomp/sso-landing-options';
			
		}
		$("#app_name").val(app_name);
		$("#ssoFrm").attr('action',act);
		return true;
	}
	return false;
});
	$("#organization_name").on('change',function(){
		
		$("#application_name").find("option").addClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option[data-id='0']").removeClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option."  + $(this).val() + "").removeClass('hide');
		
	});
});
</script>

</body>

</html>

	<?php 

define('SSO_URL','http://sso.rajasthan.gov.in');
define('SSO_API_URL',SSO_URL .':8888/SSOREST/');

//ECHO $application_str =  str_replace( 17 ,'',$application_str) ;	
//GetSSOIDFromAadhaarJSON RJCT201211017029;SHUCHITA.PRIYAMVADA; 9887388306
//$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/583112224605'; Harsh2001 PRAHLAD.NARAYAN.KAKK;
/* 	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RAHUL14336SEN/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetSSOIDFromAadhaarXML/564141571757';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
		exit; */
$POST = $_POST;
$fields = '';

function callSSO( $url, $data = false, $method ='')
	{
		$curl = curl_init();
		$url =  $url;
		switch ($method)
		{
			case "POST":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POST, 1);

				if ($data)
					curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
				break;
			case "PUT":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_PUT, 1);
				break;
			default:
				if ($data)
					$url = sprintf("%s?%s", $url, http_build_query($data));
		}
		//echo $url;
		// Optional Authentication:
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_BASIC);
	   // curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "madarsa.test:Test@1234");

		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);

		$result = curl_exec($curl);

		curl_close($curl);

		return $result;
	}
	
//$POST['encData'] = '';

if(empty($POST)){
exit;
} 
	
if(isset( $POST['userdetails'])){
	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/' . $POST['userdetails'];
	
	$output = callSSO($url);
	$result = json_decode($output,true);
	 
	if(isset($result['sAMAccountName']) && !empty($result['sAMAccountName'])){
		$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/' . $result['sAMAccountName']  . '/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RJCP201211017029/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
	}
}
 
$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="project_id" id="project_id" value="">'; 
foreach($POST as $k=>$v){
	$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="'. $k . '" value="' . $v . '">'; 
}
	
	
$servername = "10.68.181.231";
$username = "dcenoc19";
$password = "dcenoc19@123#";
$dataBase = "dcenoc19";


try {
$conn = new PDO("mysql:host=$servername;dbname=$dataBase", $username, $password);
// set the PDO error mode to exception
$conn->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE, PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);

}
catch(PDOException $e)
{
echo "Connection failed: " . $e->getMessage();exit;
}

$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM noc_sso_landings_local"); 
$stmt->execute();

// set the resulting array to associative
$result = $stmt->setFetchMode(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC); 
$data = $stmt->fetchAll();	
	
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>

 <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <title>SSO LANDING PAGE</title>
  <!-- Tell the browser to be responsive to screen width -->
  <meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no" name="viewport">
  <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />   <!-- Font Awesome -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.5.0/css/font-awesome.min.css">
  <!-- Ionicons -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/ionicons/2.0.1/css/ionicons.min.css">

 <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/AdminLTE.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/skins/skin-blue-light.min.css"/>

</head>
<body class="hold-transition login-page">

  <div class="login-logo">
    <b>LOGIN</b>
  </div>
  <!-- /.login-logo -->
  <div class="login-box-body">
    <p class="login-box-msg">Select Your Organization and Application to start your session</p>

    <form action="" method="post" id="ssoFrm">
	  <?php echo $fields;
	   echo $data[0]['description']; ?>

<script>
$(function(){
$("#ssoFrm").submit(function(){
	var act = $("#application_name").val();
	var option = $('#application_name option:selected').attr('data-project_id');
	if(option){
			$("#project_id").val(option);
	}
	var app_name = '';
	if(act!=''){
		if(act == 'College Management' || act == 'generic' || act == 'women_nonengg'  || act == 'Examination Forms'  ){
			app_name = act;
			act = 'http://hte.rajasthan.gov.in/organization/rajcomp/sso-landing-options';
			
		}
		$("#app_name").val(app_name);
		$("#ssoFrm").attr('action',act);
		return true;
	}
	return false;
});
	$("#organization_name").on('change',function(){
		
		$("#application_name").find("option").addClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option[data-id='0']").removeClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option."  + $(this).val() + "").removeClass('hide');
		
	});
});

		return $result;

		$("#application_name").find("option").addClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option[data-id='0']").removeClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option."  + $(this).val() + "").removeClass('hide');
		
	});
});
</script>

</body>

</html>

	<?php 

define('SSO_URL','http://sso.rajasthan.gov.in');
define('SSO_API_URL',SSO_URL .':8888/SSOREST/');

//ECHO $application_str =  str_replace( 17 ,'',$application_str) ;	
//GetSSOIDFromAadhaarJSON RJCT201211017029;SHUCHITA.PRIYAMVADA; 9887388306
//$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/583112224605'; Harsh2001 PRAHLAD.NARAYAN.KAKK;
/* 	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RAHUL14336SEN/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetSSOIDFromAadhaarXML/564141571757';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
		exit; */
$POST = $_POST;
$fields = '';

function callSSO( $url, $data = false, $method ='')
	{
		$curl = curl_init();
		$url =  $url;
		switch ($method)
		{
			case "POST":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POST, 1);

				if ($data)
					curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
				break;
			case "PUT":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_PUT, 1);
				break;
			default:
				if ($data)
					$url = sprintf("%s?%s", $url, http_build_query($data));
		}
		//echo $url;
		// Optional Authentication:
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_BASIC);
	   // curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "madarsa.test:Test@1234");

		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);

		$result = curl_exec($curl);

		curl_close($curl);

		return $result;
	}
	
//$POST['encData'] = '';

if(empty($POST)){
exit;
} 
	
if(isset( $POST['userdetails'])){
	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetTokenDetailJSON/' . $POST['userdetails'];
	
	$output = callSSO($url);
	$result = json_decode($output,true);
	 
	if(isset($result['sAMAccountName']) && !empty($result['sAMAccountName'])){
		$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/' . $result['sAMAccountName']  . '/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RJCP201211017029/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
	}
}
 
$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="project_id" id="project_id" value="">'; 
foreach($POST as $k=>$v){
	$fields .= '<input type="hidden" name="'. $k . '" value="' . $v . '">'; 
}
	
	
$servername = "10.68.181.231";
$username = "dcenoc19";
$password = "dcenoc19@123#";
$dataBase = "dcenoc19";


try {
$conn = new PDO("mysql:host=$servername;dbname=$dataBase", $username, $password);
// set the PDO error mode to exception
$conn->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE, PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);

}
catch(PDOException $e)
{
echo "Connection failed: " . $e->getMessage();exit;
}

$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM noc_sso_landings_local"); 
$stmt->execute();

// set the resulting array to associative
$result = $stmt->setFetchMode(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC); 
$data = $stmt->fetchAll();	
	
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>

 <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <title>SSO LANDING PAGE</title>
  <!-- Tell the browser to be responsive to screen width -->
  <meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no" name="viewport">
  <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />   <!-- Font Awesome -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.5.0/css/font-awesome.min.css">
  <!-- Ionicons -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/ionicons/2.0.1/css/ionicons.min.css">

 <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/AdminLTE.min.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://hteapp.hte.rajasthan.gov.in/courses/css/skins/skin-blue-light.min.css"/>  
<script src="jquery-2.2.4.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="hold-transition login-page">
<div class="login-box">
  <div class="login-logo">
    <b>LOGIN</b>
  </div>
  <!-- /.login-logo -->
  <div class="login-box-body">
    <p class="login-box-msg">Select Your Organization and Application to start your session</p>

    <form action="" method="post" id="ssoFrm">
	  <?php echo $fields;
	   echo $data[0]['description']; ?>
	  
   </form>

    
    <!-- /.social-auth-links -->

   

  </div>
  <!-- /.login-box-body -->
</div>
<!-- /.login-box -->

<script>
$(function(){
$("#ssoFrm").submit(function(){
	var act = $("#application_name").val();
	var option = $('#application_name option:selected').attr('data-project_id');
	if(option){
			$("#project_id").val(option);
	}
	var app_name = '';
	if(act!=''){
		if(act == 'College Management' || act == 'generic' || act == 'women_nonengg'  || act == 'Examination Forms'  ){
			app_name = act;
			act = 'http://hte.rajasthan.gov.in/organization/rajcomp/sso-landing-options';
			
		}
		$("#app_name").val(app_name);
		$("#ssoFrm").attr('action',act);
		return true;
	}
	return false;
});
	$("#organization_name").on('change',function(){
		
		$("#application_name").find("option").addClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option[data-id='0']").removeClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option."  + $(this).val() + "").removeClass('hide');
		
	});
});
</script>

</body>

</html>

		{

				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POST, 1);

					curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
				break;
			case "PUT":
				curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_PUT, 1);
				break;
			default:
				if ($data)
					$url = sprintf("%s?%s", $url, http_build_query($data));
		}
		//echo $url;
		// Optional Authentication:
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_BASIC);
	   // curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "madarsa.test:Test@1234");

		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
		curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);

		$result = curl_exec($curl);

		curl_close($curl);

		return $result;
	}

		$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/' . $result['sAMAccountName']  . '/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
	//	$url =  SSO_API_URL . 'GetUserDetailJSON/RJCP201211017029/madarsa.test/Test@1234';
		$output = callSSO($url);
		$result1 = json_decode($output,true);
		echo '<pre class="hide">';
		print_r($result1);
		echo '</pre>';
		
	}
}

<div class="login-box">
  <div class="login-logo">
    <b>LOGIN</b>
  </div>
  <!-- /.login-logo -->
  <div class="login-box-body">
    <p class="login-box-msg">Select Your Organization and Application to start your session</p>

    <form action="" method="post" id="ssoFrm">
	  <?php echo $fields;
	   echo $data[0]['description']; ?>
	  
   </form>

    
    <!-- /.social-auth-links -->

   

  </div>
  <!-- /.login-box-body -->

<!-- /.login-box -->

<script>
$(function(){
$("#ssoFrm").submit(function(){
	var act = $("#application_name").val();
	var option = $('#application_name option:selected').attr('data-project_id');
	if(option){
			$("#project_id").val(option);
	}
	var app_name = '';
	if(act!=''){
		if(act == 'College Management' || act == 'generic' || act == 'women_nonengg'  || act == 'Examination Forms'  ){
			app_name = act;
			act = 'http://hte.rajasthan.gov.in/organization/rajcomp/sso-landing-options';
			
		}
		$("#app_name").val(app_name);
		$("#ssoFrm").attr('action',act);
		return true;
	}
	return false;
});
	$("#organization_name").on('change',function(){
		
		$("#application_name").find("option").addClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option[data-id='0']").removeClass('hide');
		$("#application_name").find("option."  + $(this).val() + "").removeClass('hide');
		
	});
});
</script>

</body>

</html>
